title: Rebrand UI to Adwait Loop with an “A” logo

requirements.text: Generate a new brand logo mark that is a clean, standalone “A” logo and a matching wordmark for the app name “Adwait Loop”, and store them as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: branding update- change it to A logo

acceptanceCriteria: New image files exist at the specified filenames in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The logo is visually an “A” mark (not the previous looping/spiral motif).
The wordmark reads “Adwait Loop” and matches the logo’s style (consistent color/line/weight).

requirements.text: Update the app header branding in frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx to use the new “A” logo and “Adwait Loop” wordmark assets (including updating the img alt text accordingly).

quotes: branding update- change it to A logo

acceptanceCriteria: AppShell header no longer references /assets/generated/logic-looper-logo.dim_512x512.png or /assets/generated/logic-looper-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png.
Header images render correctly on desktop and mobile breakpoints.
Both header image alt texts reference “Adwait Loop” (or “Adwait Loop logo/wordmark”).

requirements.text: Update remaining visible app branding strings from “Logic Looper” to “Adwait Loop” in user-facing UI locations surfaced in the current codebase (at minimum: Home page welcome header, footer copyright label, and the browser tab title in frontend/index.html).

quotes: also can you change from logic looper to LoopIQ – by Adwait
branding update- change it to A logo

acceptanceCriteria: Home page heading no longer says “Welcome to Logic Looper”.
AppShell footer no longer says “Logic Looper”.
No new user-facing text is introduced in any language other than English.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn UI components are read-only in this environment).
Do not introduce new backend canisters/services; branding changes must be frontend/static-asset only.
nonGoals: Changing gameplay logic, puzzle generation, persistence, or leaderboard behavior.
Adding new authentication providers or altering Internet Identity behavior.

required: Minimal “A” logo mark, flat/vector style, transparent background (adwait-loop-a-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Typographic wordmark reading “Adwait Loop”, transparent background (adwait-loop-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png)
